column2: High impact marketing.<newline>Attracts lots of adult groups.
High impact marketing.<newline>Attracts lots of families.
High impact marketing.<newline>Attracts lots of teenagers.
Low impact marketing.<newline>Attract more adult groups
Low impact marketing.<newline>Attract more groups of teenagers.
Divisive appeal.<newline>Attracts more adults, but fewer families
Divisive appeal.<newline>Attracts more families, but fewer teenagers
Divisive appeal.<newline>Attracts more teens, but fewer adults.
